sources.title: Rory's Way (The Etruscan Smile) | Full Drama Movie | Brian Cox
sources.description:
Brian Cox (Golden Globe Winner for HBO's Succession) is Rory MacNeil, a rugged old Scotsman who reluctantly leaves his beloved isolated Hebridean island for San Francisco to seek medical treatment. Moving in with his estranged son, Rory's life will be unexpectedly transformed through a newly found love for his baby grandson.  

2018.  Stars: Brian Cox, JJ Feild, Thora Birch
